Results Stats

WPM: words-per-minute - the total amount of correct characters typed in correct words, including spaces, divided by 5, divided by the test time, and multiplied by 60 to standardise to 1 minute, rounded to the nearest whole number.

Accuracy: the total correct characters, including spaces, divided by the total characters typed, multiplied by 100 to give a percentage and rounded to the nearest whole number.

Words: total number of correctly typed characters, including spaces, divided by 5 (average word length), rounded to the nearest whole number.

Characters: total number of correctly typed characters, including spaces, rounded to the nearest whole number.

Errors: total number of incorrectly pressed characters, including spaces.

Raw: the same calculation used for WPM, but includes incorrect characters.

Time: the duration of the test.
